entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who yells at Fang to calm down. He chases after the boarhound when it takes flight.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is a great boarhound that takes flight and causes chaos in the castle.

entities.name: sir cadogan
entities.description: Sir Cadogan is a little painted knight who rushes from painting to painting, clanking along in his armor and screaming encouragement to Harry Potter.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the students standing beside an empty plinth with a secret passageway. He shouts at Harry that it's a nice night for their activities.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is one of the students standing beside an empty plinth with a secret passageway.

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: Hannah Abbott is one of the students standing beside an empty plinth with a secret passageway.

entities.name: the order
entities.description: The Order is mentioned as something that teachers are part of, but it's not clear what this refers to in the context of the story.
